docs: Constructor that initializes the `bool` value to the given `init_value`.
constructors.label: new

docs: Constructor that initializes the `bool` value to `false`.
Constructors can delegate to other constructors.
constructors.label: default

docs: A message that can be called on instantiated contracts.
This one flips the value of the stored `bool` from `true`
messages.label: flip

docs: Simply returns the current value of our `bool`.
messages.label: get
